#Text=Wikinews Shorts : December 7 , 2008
#Text=A compilation of brief news reports for Sunday , December 7 , 2008 .
#Text=' Progress ' seen in US auto bailout deal
#Text=Officials say that progress is being made in a deal to bail out three United States carmakers .
#Text=The U.S. government will be holding weekend talks on the plan after two days of Congressional hearings .
#Text=Dana Perino , the White House press secretary , stated that discussions with both parties had been " constructive " .
#Text=Executives from the three companies - General Motors , Ford , and Chrysler - have pleaded before two Congressional committees , asking for $ 34 billion in order to stop collapse .
#Text=" I 'm convinced that by Sunday we will have an agreement that people can understand on this bill , " said Barney Frank , a representative from the state of Massachusetts .
#Text=Sources
#Text=" ' Progress ' in US auto bail-out " — BBC News , December 6 , 2008

column1: #Text=Ghana to hold elections
#Text=This story has updates
#Text=See Ghanian presidential elections go to run-off
#Text=The people of Ghana , a country often shown of as an example of a good democracy in Africa , will vote for a new president and parliament .
#Text=The current president , John Kufuor , will resign after serving the maximum of two terms in office .
#Text=The elections are expected to be close .

#Text=The three main contenders for the presidency are : the Nana Akufo Addo from New Patriotic Party , who was the foreign minister under the current president , John Atta Mills running for the National Democratic Congress , and the Convention People 's Party 's candidate , one Paa Kwesi Nduom .
#Text=Sources
#Text=Douglas Mpuga .
#Text=" Ghanaians Enthusiastic About Sunday Poll " — VOA News , December 6 , 2008

column1: #Text=Will Ross .
#Text=" Ghana to vote for new president " — BBC News Online , December 6 , 2008
#Text=Archbishop of York says Mugabe must be overthrown
#Text=The Archbishop of York , Dr John Sentamu , said that Zimbabwe 's president Robert Mugabe must be forced out of office and face trial for his crimes against humanity .
#Text=" The time has come for Robert Mugabe to answer for his crimes against humanity , against his countrymen and women and for justice to be done .

column1: #Text=Dr Sentamu 's statement comes after a severe cholera outbreak spread in Zimbabwe , and saw 12,545 cases reported and 565 people dead .
#Text=Sources
#Text=" Archbishop urges Mugabe overthrow " — BBC News Online , December 6 , 2008

column1: #Text=" Mugabe must be toppled now - Archbishop of York " — guardian.co.uk , December 6 , 2008
#Text=Scandal-ridden Congressman loses delayed election

#Text=Republicans experienced another victory late Saturday , as the Associated Press called the race in Louisiana 's 2nd district at 22:35 CST in favor of Anh " Joseph " Cao , heralding the first Vietnamese - American member of Congress and sending the incumbent scandal-ridden Louisiana Congressman William Jefferson home after nine terms .
#Text=Sources
#Text=" Beleaguered congressman trails in Louisiana vote " — CNN , December 6 , 2008
#Text=" APNewsShort " — Associated Press , December 6 , 2008
